title: Re: I stink.
content:
Some tips:

1.) Perform a spell check on your posts, and wait 2 miniutes before posting, this will give you a more serious view of posting.

2.) Type with only one finger, this will limit your posting and make yuo think about what you post.

3.) Never post twice in a topic in the same day.

4.) Or two topics in the same forum in two days.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

Complain, complain, whine and mope!

I guess its like those hardcore enviromentalists, or 'the last days' christians. Maybe its what makes us go see disaster movies.

title: Re: ?
content:
Yeah, Me and Djaser in the same topic.

[quote]Quote:[hr]How could you criticize atheism. That's like criticize nothing because that's what it really is.
Anyway bring on the to small Mort clothes....[hr][/quote]

Well it depends;

1.) You can criticize an absence of something, be it a quality or belief.

2.) Most 'atheisim' [I don't believe God exists] is actually Nontheisim [I believe God doesn't exist.] Same thing? No; one is an absence of belief, the other, much more common is a conviction that theistic beliefs are wrong.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[quote]Quote:[hr]2.) Most 'atheisim' [I don't believe God exists] is actually Nontheisim [I believe God doesn't exist.] Same thing? No; one is an absence of belief, the other, much more common is a conviction that theistic beliefs are wrong.[hr][/quote]

title: Re: ?
content:
Gah! No!

Consider, 'The flag is black' vs 'The flag is not white'

Or, in a force model, theists and antitheists are opposites; it is the belief of one that the other is directly wrong. Whereas the true atheist simply doesn't belive theisim is correct.

It is the difference between not caring about someone and hating them.
